title: Sakkon no Cinderella wa Kutsu wo Otosanai.
original_name: 昨今のシンデレラは靴を落とさない。
sinopse:
In the middle of a grand ball, my fiancé cancelled the engagement. The reason was... I tried to avoid the cancellation of the engagement, but it wasn't meant to be. An unfortunate pitiful lady and a stubborn general.

(Source: Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)
